data.title: BEST FILM & OTHER FILM ACHIEVEMENTS BY YEAR
data.meta_description: 2011 FILM: Images of a Lost City (Jon Jost, Portugal, South Korea) FULMMAkER: Béla Tarr, Ágnes Hranitzky, The Horse of Turin SCENARIST: Ermanno Olmi, The CardboardVillage CINEMATOGRAPHER: Fabio Olmi, The CardboardVillage ACTOR: Theódór Júlíusson, Volcano ACTRESS: Kirsten Dunst, Melancholia SUPPORTING ACTOR: Anton Adasinskiy, Faust                                                                    SUPPORTING ACTRESS: Anjelica Huston, 50/50 2010 FILM: Film socialisme (Jean-Luc Godard,…
